appetizers.name: Nachos
appetizers.description: Try our delicious nachos with just a little kick and all of the melted cheese that you could ever want.

appetizers.name: Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: Delicious seasoned fries, smothered in melted Colby Jack cheese, and finally drizzled with Ranch Dressing.

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey Club
cold sandwiches.description: Tastey, juicy and full of flavor! You will not be disappointed by our Turkey Club.

cold sandwiches.name: BLT
cold sandwiches.description: Another classic. What more do you need then some bacon, lettuce and tomato?? GET IT!!

hot sandwiches.name: French Dip
hot sandwiches.description: A nice hot roast beef sub with Au Jus for dipping.

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: What really needds to be said about this tried and true classic??

desserts.name: New York Style Cheese Cake
desserts.description: Silky delicious cheese cake with strawberry swirls, sure to please.

desserts.name: Fudge Brownie
desserts.description: A gooey, chocolatey treat, that basically melts into your mouth.

drinks.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
drinks.description: When it's a hot day but you still need that energy jolt, grab our Iced Vanilla Latte, and then be ready to face the day.

drinks.name: Shirley Temple
drinks.description: A sweet and simple taste that even Shirley would be all for!
